comments:
driver used: WSWB 3.0M9 integration I20040413-200404151406 + 
hyades.runtime_3.0_20040419_0915.zip

to reproduce the problem:
>Open Profiling perspective, and create a simple project in resouce navigator.
>create a new Perfmom Data Collection Agent launch configuration, connect 
to 'localhost'(default) and browse to the newly created project
>hit 'Apply' and 'Run'

nothing happen, no agent created.

looking at the .log file, see the following Exception.

and other than that, I find that the launch configuration dialog are allowed to 
be apply and run even if I don't pick a project. Apply and Run buttons are 
always enabled, they should be enabled only when user have all the require 
field in the configuration are filled properly

About the exception, this is a known defect and has been fixed. There were some 
threading changes in the latest eclipse build which exposed this. Please sync 
with the repository..

As curtis mentioned, the exception has been fixed.

The other problems mentioned have been fixed and added to CVS in 3.0

Thanks for pointing out the exception.

The laungher first does not show any error message and Run button is enable 
even with no project being specify and created.
Only after when I made some user interactions(eg. clicking the browse botton)
within the new launcher, error message shown.

and the error message is "BAD_CONTAINER"
The above problems have been fixed and are in CVS in 3.0
